title: Wales and the art of fine dying
description: It's summer in Wales and the rain falls warmer and softer than last week. Mari Grønnvang, aspiring writer, is driving along the coastline of Pembrokeshire with her partner, Petter. They are here to write a travel guide for the modern bon-vivant. But this is the land of flexible reality and it will not be written about without having a say in the matter.This is the English translation of my book 'Kunsten å være død i Wales'.
author: Tone Wasbak Melbye
